Wrongfully Accused

Ano: 1998

IMDb ID: tt0120901

Classificação: 6

Sinopse: Ryan Harrison, a violin god, superstar and sex symbol does not want to cheat with sexy Lauren Goodhue, who is married to Ryan Goodhue. Shortly after that Mr. Goodhue is found murdered and Ryan suddenly finds himself being the main suspect. After being sentenced to death he manages to flee while being transferred to his execution site. Now, all the world is after him as he stumbles from one unfortunate incident to the next in order to find the real murderer.—Julian Reischl
